name: jamers
text: A shame we haven't seen Chucklebot in a while. Or Philippe with a rad mohawk.

name: steerpike66
text: Oh, so Chucklebot wasn't stalking Philippe, which would be horrible. He was just lifelessly staring at him with his dead glass eyes until repowered. To talk about A-HA.

name: equinn2006
text: Still doesn't explain why he was in there to begin with.

name: _cheesekayke
text: To talk about Billy Idol.

name: tekende
text: To make Phillipe chuckle.

name: tetrisattack
text: Chuckle bot is goofy. No one thinks Billy Idol's a dish.

name: songbirdspectre
text: untrue. my friend's mother with platinum blonde hair, fake boobs, and leather skin thinks he's a major dish.

name: tetrisattack
text: Oh no!

name: overmedicated
text: I think he was a major dish in the day, and I'm straight.

name: blarghamagarky
text: you make out with your dude friends though, you could totally want to make out with billy idol

name: overmedicated
text: A comment left by overmedicated was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by songbirdspectre, PoodleLucy, blarghamagarky)

name: songbirdspectre
text: ooh. i hate you.

name: blarghamagarky
text: your comments were in sequence with my reading within like 10 minutes of each other, but whatever you totally want to bang billy idol

name: harletron
text: Dang, the ladies ain't having NONE of that sass man. Seriously, stop cold mackin on dudes. it's ok if you're drunk, but it's not ok if you brag about it on a webcomic message board after. this is called "logic"

name: overmedicated
text:
I can say whatever the hell I like on here, safe in the knowledge that no-one will slap me on the face or pierce my scrotum with a Brantano stilleto.

this is what the internet means to me

name: semiquaver
text: You might get e-kissed by a dude. We are the same age. On Internet, this might not be considered eerie or inappropriate.

name: bjorntd
text: No. Just weird.

name: semiquaver
text: Getting a stilleto scrotum pierce? That's weirder.

name: bjorntd
text:
I'm not sure what to make of you, semiquaver.

Perhaps a hat.

name: semiquaver
text: Might I suggest a fine, leather-like vest?

name: heccibiggs
text: Yeah, to be fair, this was the same for me. You're all "I made out with a dude" and "Billy Idol would totally get it" in the space of about five comics. I think you need to ask yourself some serious questions.

name: overmedicated
text:
Man why is always the dames hatin' on me

Do I smell and just not know? I have asked myself that before.

name: farqussus
text: you smell like desperation

name: boredom_man
text: and it makes me horny

name: donnatron
text: I also knew the comment threads. Gotta watch what you write!

name: charchar
text: dude, B-cups are people too.

name: farqussus
text: yeah, i would have thought b is not a good size, but once you see a b you are pleasantly surprised, and not just because you can see a boob.

name: charchar
text: big enough to matter, small enough not to be a hassle. Yay, boobs!

name: farqussus
text:
a chubby for your boobs.

umm. wait. no, you know what, I stand by it.

name: manxome
text:
The nice guy in me wants to gasp in appreciative shock at this.

The man in me wants to high five you when my girlfriend looks away.

name: peterjoel
text: Leather skin

name: tekende
text: This is clearly not true. I saw him in concert around a year ago, maybe year and a half. The man is a musclebound god. I am a straight man and even I was a bit attracted. There were many girls who very excited to see him.

name: kamet
text: I would so do Billy Idol from 20 years ago...

name: farqussus
text: there is a reason his snarl has been appropriated by the drag queen community.

name: autrepoupee
text: There are people on earth who wouldn't make a dish of Billy Idol, from then or now?

name: cousinted
text: Chucklebot is the Yin to Pat's yang.

name: jdhenry105
text: I'd let Chucklebot rock my can.

name: overmedicated
text: Woo! A robot is totally rockin' my can!

name: tekende
text: WHAT IT IS YOU ROCK N ROLL FAGGOTS

name: joestork
text:
It's the zoom-in on the last panel that makes this.

I have to say, it breaks my dang fucking heart to see these older strips scoring so low. They have a strange, spare humor... In some ways, subtler than the new stuff.

name: quantumcasaba
text:
"He's funny! But he usually isn't in my room at night."
Perfect mix of relief and vague apprehension.
Empty room > Chucklebot > Alligators

name: mattylite
text: If I had a dime for every time I've been described "He's funny! But he usually isn't in my room at night" I could buy, um, some night vision goggles?

name: overmedicated
text: The 4th panel sends my imagination to dark places I don't particularly want to visit.

name: cyberia
text: Billy Idol is definitely a dish I would like to have for dinner. And I need to find a way to work 'He's funny but he usually isn't in my room at night' into conversation.

name: gavgav
text: Don't worry, the time will come.

name: triptaphane
text: Fav'rite alt-text ever.
